name: Combat Style Master

sections.name: Prerequisites
sections.description: Improved Unarmed Strike, two or more style feats, base attack bonus +6 or monk level 5th.

sections.body: You can switch your style as a free action. At the start of combat, pick one of your styles. You start the combat in that style, even in the surprise round.
sections.name: Benefits

sections.body: It takes a swift action to begin or switch your styles.
sections.name: Normal

description: You shift between combat styles, combining them to increased effect.
